enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc.ove: Fires additional arrows in similar directions based on level.
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc.over: Allows projectiles to pierce through mobs and ignore a percentage of their armor based on level.
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping_edge.desc: Increases the damage and range of sweeping attacks based on level and the amount of enemies hit.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: High resistance to fire, lightning and freeze damage and reduced burn time if you're set ablaze.
enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc.ov: Moderate damage resistance to most close-up physical damage sources.
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc.over: Allows the weapon to fire normal arrows for free.
enchantment.minecraft.power.desc.overrid: Increases the damage of projectiles fired from the weapon.
